attributes.title: Hate.
attributes.review: Hate hate hate. Shane YAW (self proclaimed p3d0phile) suggested it to me while I was looking for apps to download for a fun time. If you want a fun time this is NOT the app for you. Itâ€™s boring and the layout is terrible. A better app is the lighter app. Thanks for reading this please remove this app from the AppStore.

attributes.title: worst app iâ€™ve ever got
attributes.review: this app is horrible. within 3 minutes of it being on my phone my phone was hacked. i took it to verizon bc thatâ€™s my carrier and they told me thereâ€™s nothing they can do. i got a new phone trying to resolve the issue but whenever i use the apple id used to download this app, my phone goes back to being hacked. so now i have to get a whole new apple id and phone. canâ€™t believe the president would want to hack into our phones. yâ€™all be careful

attributes.title: I Felt Violated
attributes.review: After an extensive download period the app starts by wanting personal information.  Then it makes rude comments about women and minorities, by the end I had to delete it because it kept calling for Tik Tok to pay for building a firewall. Terrible.
